member.name: T:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfAliases
member.summary: A set of Cake aliases for Entity Framework (not .NET Core) code-first migrations.

member.name: M:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfAliases.CreateEfMigrator(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new EfMigrator for use in EF6 code-first migrations.

member.name: T:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings
member.summary: Contains settings for working with EntityFramework6 .

member.name: P:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings.AssemblyPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the assembly path.
member.value: The path to the assembly where the EF configuration class is located.

member.name: P:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings.ConfigurationClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration class.
member.value: The fully qualified name of the EF configuration class for code-first migrations.

member.name: P:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings.AppConfigPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the app.config path.
member.value: The path to the app.config (or web.config) containing the settings/configurations used by EF.

member.name: P:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string.
member.value: The connection string to be used for code-first migrations.

member.name: P:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings.ConnectionProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection provider.
member.value: The connection provider to be used for code-first migrations.

member.name: P:Cake.EntityFramework.CakeTranslation.EfMigratorSettings.ConnectionName
member.summary: The name of the connection string in the configuration file. This can be used to load the connection string and provider.
